item.title: Chhayanaut building vandalised, set on fire after news of Hadi's death
item.description: The premises of Bengali cultural organisation Chhayanaut have been vandalised and set on fire after news of the death of Inqilab Moncho Convenor Sharif Osman bin Hadi spread. The attack came around 2am on Friday, after Inqilab Moncho confirmed the death of Hadi, who was in treatment in Singapore.
